verses.name: 2 Chronicles 4:9
verses.text: Furthermore he made the court of the priests, and the great court, and doors for the court, and overlaid the doors of them with brass.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 4:10
verses.text: And he set the sea on the right side of the east end, over against the south.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 4:11
verses.text: And Huram made the pots, and the shovels, and the basons. And Huram finished the work that he was to make for king Solomon for the house of God;
